name: majorprojectaibnb
description: Wanderlust is a travel exploration platform designed to help users discover exciting destinations and plan personalized itineraries. It provides essential travel information, user-friendly planning tools, and an interactive community for sharing experiences. Whether you're a solo traveler or planning a group trip, Wanderlust makes travel planning seamless and enjoyable. WanderLust is a full-stack travel listing web application built using **Node.js**, **Express**, **MongoDB**, and **EJS**. It allows users to view, create, and edit listings with proper validation and error handling.
